## 🚀 Quick start

### 🥇 Gatsby

- Gatsby is a javascript framework which works over React.
- It is used to develop single page web application
- In react javascript is everything and that is why it's SEO decreases
- Gatsby has Solutions for SEO
- Gatsby has better approach of image
- Gatsby make easy to work with graphql

### 🥈 Material-Ui

- It is a react based component library which is based on google design pattern.
- It has various types of components
- It has special component for making style
- there are many special thing about Material Ui

### 🥉 Contentful

- Contentful is a headless CMS (Content Management System)
- It provides us a better way to store our data
- It provides Free tier to store data and we are using that.
